snippet: The organizers of the Academy Awards are putting rules in place for next year to prevent any missteps in the film campaign process, targeting the music categories....

headline.print_headline: Oscar Organizers Outline New Regulations for Music Categories
headline.main: Oscar Organizers Outline New Regulations for Music Categories

lead_paragraph: The organizers of the Academy Awards are putting rules in place for next year to prevent any missteps in the film campaign process, targeting the music categories.
